snippet: The same wines go with both centerpieces of the traditional Thanksgiving dinner, with a sparkling rosé or chardonnay to start.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column describes wines he plans to pair with Thanksgiving dinner (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The same wines go with both centerpieces of the traditional Thanksgiving dinner, with a sparkling rosé or chardonnay to start.

headline.seo: Thanksgiving Wines to Go With Turkey, or Duck
